title: Drawing Application Feature Set Validation
goal: Verify that the drawing application correctly implements the canvas, pencil tool, color selection, and save functionality.

steps.expected: The application window opens displaying a canvas area and a toolbar.

steps.action: Select the Pencil tool button on the toolbar
steps.expected: The pencil tool becomes the active drawing instrument.

steps.action: Select a color from the color selector palette
steps.expected: The active drawing color is updated to the selected value.

steps.action: Perform a drag operation with the mouse on the canvas
steps.expected: A line is drawn on the canvas in the selected color following the mouse path.

steps.action: Click the Save button on the toolbar
steps.expected: The application triggers a save operation, preserving the current state of the canvas.
